prompts: Create a crab-like Pokemon with large claws and a vibrant color scheme.
I want a unique fighting-type Pokemon that thrives in coastal environments.
Generate a playful Pokemon that uses its claws for combat and fun.
Make a creature that represents both land and sea with an eye-catching design.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a colorful appearance and is known for its strength.
Design a small but mighty Pokemon that can be found in urban settings.
Show me a Pokemon that has a combination of blue and purple colors.
